text: The women's team classification tennis event at the 2019 Summer Universiade was held between 5 and 13 July 2019 at the Circolo Tennis and Lungomare in Naples, Italy. == Ranking system == The following chart shows that the points earned by each placing in the events: {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center;" width=20% |- ! rowspan="2" | Placing ! colspan="2" | Points |- ! Singles !
